Package moteur

Interface Cards

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardsAJouer
    public interface Cards
    The interface Card contains two basic operations of a card, as they have in the real world : it has a value and a color. To be mentioned, there is ONE SPECIAL card, which is the reference card, on which there will be all of the small hints of the game Jest. Considering the coherence of the system, in the enumeration of the cards' values(CarteValeur.java), as well as their colors(CarteCouleur.java), we have especially declaraed for the reference card : CarteValeur.REFCARD and CarteCouleur.REFCARD.

    In the interface Cards, there are two abstract methodes : CarteValeur getValue() and CarteCouleur getColor(). Thoses are two simple getters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CarteCouleur getColor()
      CarteCouleur, getter in order to get the color.
      CarteValeur getValue()
      CarteValeur, getter in order to get the value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        CarteValeur getValue()
        CarteValeur, getter in order to get the value. To be implemented in the subclass.
        Returns:
        type of CarteValeur, used to get the value of the cards.

      • getColor

        CarteCouleur getColor()
        CarteCouleur, getter in order to get the color. To be implemented in the subclass.
        Returns:
        type of CarteCouleur, used to get the color of the cards.
